value.title: Add a measure without Power BI Desktop (Premium)
value.excerpt: Need to add a measure to your Power BI dataset? Can't download it back in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you how you can still add that measure even though you can't use Power BI Desktop!  Tabular Editor 2 https://github.com/TabularEditor/TabularEditor  Tabular Editor 3 https://tabulareditor.com/  游닉

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft
